formula: G.f.: (1+x^8)/(1-x-x^9).For positive integers n and k such that k <= n <= 9*k, and 8 divides n-k, define c(n,k) = binomial(k,(n-k)/8), and c(n,k) = 0, otherwise. Then, for n>= 1, a(n-1) = sum(c(n,k), k=1..n). - Milan Janjic, Dec 09 2011
